          <title>
            <string language="sl">Iskalec besed</string>
            <string language="en">Searcher of words</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forscher von Wörtern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chercheur des mots</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni listi se lahko uporabijo v drugem razredu kot dodatno delo za tiste učence, ki se dolgočasijo pri pouku saj so že opismenjeni.</string>
            <string language="en">Simple exercise - found known words in the character mesh.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en">word</string>
          </keyword>

Zeichen greifen ineinander.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice simple - les mots connus trouvés dans le
caractère engrènent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício simples - as palavras sabidas 
encontradas no caráter engrenam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione semplice - le parole conosciute

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή άσκηση - γνωστές λέξεις στο πλέγμα χαρακτήρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio simple - las palabras sabidas 
encontradas en el carácter endientan.</string>
